This may be hard to believe since its a stry as old as time that some bastard pretends to be some famous dude and gets to hack into his account convincing people thats real, BUT THIS IS THE TRUE ANORAK778010!!!!! 

Today, at least 2 years later after my succeeding demo project An Extremley Stupid RPG, I remebered this in my Computer AP class, I'm in highschool, but the problem is, I have like 5 different gmail accounts on my old school account and i forgot the password for all of them, i want to update this game, but i cant unless i get help.
